title: Subpart 53-2 - Disclosure Requirements
content:
Subpart 53-2 - Disclosure Requirements

State Regulations
§ 53-2.1 - Preliminary information for policies subject to section 4232(b) of the insurance law
§ 53-2.2 - Policy summary information for policies subject to section 4232(b) of the insurance law
§ 53-2.3 - Additional disclosure rules for graded death benefit life insurance issued between ages 50 and 75
§ 53-2.4 - Rules for the calculation of the life insurance surrender cost index
§ 53-2.5 - Rules for the calculation of the life insurance net payment cost index
§ 53-2.6 - Buyer's guide
§ 53-2.7 - Life insurance buyer's guide
§ 53-2.8 - Addendum to life insurance buyer's guide

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
